Blacklisted_Mod.message: We do not allow our players to utilize blacklisted modifications on our servers.

Inappropriate.message: We do not allow behavior on our servers that is seen as inappropriate.

Predatory.message: Predatory behavior or explicit content in any form is not permitted on our servers.

Discrimination.message: We do not allow any discriminatory behavior on our servers, or toward other players.

Trolling.message: Any form of trolling is not permitted on our servers.

False_Info.message: Spreading false information knowingly is not permitted on our servers.

Disrespect.message: Disrespect towards players on our servers is not permitted.

Harrassment.message: Harrassing other players/and or staff is not permitted.

Server_Ad.message: Redirecting players to external servers off our network is not permitted.

Under_13.message: Players must be at least 13 years old to play on our servers. We do not accept appeals.
